comment:
* Information you can retrieve about a particular Service that is
     * currently running in the system.

variables.name: pid
variables.comment: * If non-zero, this is the process the service is running in.

variables.name: uid
variables.comment: * The UID that owns this service.

variables.name: process
variables.comment: * The name of the process this service runs in.

variables.name: foreground
variables.comment: * Set to true if the service has asked to run as a foreground process.

variables.name: activeSince
variables.comment:
* The time when the service was first made active, either by someone
         * starting or binding to it.  This
         * is in units of {@link android.os.SystemClock#elapsedRealtime()}.

variables.name: started
variables.comment: * Set to true if this service has been explicitly started.

variables.name: clientCount
variables.comment: * Number of clients connected to the service.

variables.name: crashCount
variables.comment:
* Number of times the service's process has crashed while the service
         * is running.

variables.name: lastActivityTime
variables.comment:
* The time when there was last activity in the service (either
         * explicit requests to start it or clients binding to it).  This
         * is in units of {@link android.os.SystemClock#uptimeMillis()}.

variables.name: restarting
variables.comment:
* If non-zero, this service is not currently running, but scheduled to
         * restart at the given time.

variables.name: FLAG_STARTED
variables.comment:
* Bit for {@link #flags}: set if this service has been
         * explicitly started.

variables.name: FLAG_FOREGROUND
variables.comment:
* Bit for {@link #flags}: set if the service has asked to
         * run as a foreground process.

variables.name: FLAG_SYSTEM_PROCESS
variables.comment:
* Bit for {@link #flags}: set if the service is running in a
         * core system process.

variables.name: FLAG_PERSISTENT_PROCESS
variables.comment:
* Bit for {@link #flags}: set if the service is running in a
         * persistent process.

variables.name: clientPackage
variables.comment:
* For special services that are bound to by system code, this is
         * the package that holds the binding.

variables.name: clientLabel
variables.comment:
* For special services that are bound to by system code, this is
         * a string resource providing a user-visible label for who the
         * client is.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
